content:
There's an implementation guide that's got a problem with realm.

Here's the publication checklist as submitted by the editor:

  • Name of IG: HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: Clinical Decision Support for Immunizations, Release 1 - US Realm
  • Project Insight ID:
  • Publication Type: 3
  • Ballot Cycle: 2
  • URL of CI Build: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ImmunizationFHIRDS/index.html
  • Link to FMG approval for IG Proposal: the initial approval of the IG was before proposals were required
  • Is this the first time this IG has been published? : Yes
  • Realm Matches realm code in IG proposal: true
  • Approved Realm Code: US
  • Code Matches code identified in IG proposal: true
  • Approved Code: ImmunizationFHIRDS
  • Requested Version of IG: 1.0
  • Code and realm in NPM Package name, canonical URL and IG URL match those in approved IG Proposal:true
  • Version approved by Product Director: true
  • Package-list.json exists and has a correctly populated entry (except for date):true
  • Header conforms to FHIR IG Publishing Requirements:Correct HL7 logo is displayed/ Shows name of IG and ballot status correctly/ Yellow publish box displays correctly
  • Footer conforms to FHIR IG Publishing Requirements:Publishing WG is displayed/ Propose Changes Link is displayed/ packageID is displayed/ History Link is displayed/ FHIR version is displayed/ FHIR IG Version is displayed/ Copyright (© 20YY+) is displayed
  • Commit is done to publish IG to the CI Build Site:true
  • The QA.html is clean with no errors or warnings: true
  • Please explain all errors and warnings in QA.html if not clean:
  • If applicable, Ballot reconciliation is complete for previous ballot and package is posted to the Ballot Desktop: true
  • Name of Sponsoring WG:Public Health
  • Sponsoring Work Group has approved the content for ballot or publication: true
  • TSC has approved the content for ballot or publication:false
  • Link to TSC approval for Publication:

relevant links:

  • current draft: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ImmunizationFHIRDS/ (claims to be US realm)
  • github: https://github.com/HL7/ImmunizationFHIRDS
  • version history: http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/immds/history.html (uv realm)
  • Dependencies: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ImmunizationFHIRDS/qa.html - depends on US Core
  • NIB: http://www.hl7.org/special/committees/tsc/ballotmanagement/ViewPastNIB.cfm?ballot_pool_id=1138 - uv realm
  • FMG Approvals: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Clinical+Decision+Support+For+Immunizations+FHIR+IG+Proposal - incomplete - obviously we never approved this (editor says: "the initial approval of the IG was before proposals were required")
  • ballot: it was balloted as US realm in the 2019 September Ballot Cycle

You might also note that there's a problem with the code. It will stay as immds, not ImmunizationFHIRDS. That, at least, I can just decide. But the realm thing.... It's not being submitted for ballot, but for publication. So there's no urgency, so discussion about this at the next FMG meeting please
